After reading the note at the last page, I felt Nekoi Hikaru's grief when he wrote this doujin. This may be funny to some of us and saying "lol he fucked his cat" but he wrote this to cope up with the sadness of losing two of his family. I experienced something similar. Losing a friend is a really painful event to go through. I hope Hikaru-sensei is doing well now. His cats are guarding him wherever he goes. May the idiot sandwiches not be you.

So a bit of an hopeful take on my end here no need to care if you came here to fap but. The very first panel we see the line "up until recently I'd always lived by myself" followed up by "But yesterday this strange little girl...Barged into my life", while he doesn't use the name Shion it is fair to assume that he is still in shock. We then procced to view what can likely be a flashback re-tellling the story of yesterday. And at the 2nd to last panel we see the line "I thought it was all a dream but" and then he starts to cry which he then asks himself "why?" which is then followed by the line "Because it wasn't a dream". Which would end the flashback and bring us to present day at the first panel. Meaning that he got a cat girl who can hide her cat parts so they look like a normal couple. Or Im being wishful and he dreamed it all up or more grimly actually died in the fire and this is him living a happy dream only for it to break at the end. Anyways hope you had fun reading this.

In p.25 at first the collar is in front of his hand but in the next panel it's the cat. This probably means he sees his cat represented by the collar and us seeing the cat is sort of a literal representation of it. This doesn't explain how the collar got there so hope still exists for a happy ending, although it could be that he found the collar in the burned wreckage since it is mentioned that the cat was found often without the collar in p.16 and the cat just couldn't be found or the corpse was reduced to ashes. Just my two cents.

Hello, Nekoi Hikaru here.
 It has been 2 years since the fire, and work has been picking up since.
 I just want to say thanks to all my readers who've been following my work. 
I'll keep the feedback from your discussions for reference for my future work too.

For those who're interested, I've set up a patreon account as well! My latest doujin for C95 is also complete, and will be featuring English version as well.

P.S. Since English is not my native language, I got my friend to translate this message for me (not that it's my native language either). If you have any other feedback, please feel free to send me a message. I'll try my best to reply.

I’ve never really analyzed a hentai doujinshi but I just have to for this one. The artistic sketches that fit perfectly with situation and the astoundingly gorgeous story certainly makes this one of the best doujins out there. Though I had issues with some of the actions done by the mc and dialogues, the integral building up of these characters are what make this doujin so satisfying. I have to say that I was skeptical at first when I saw the tags along with the first few pages thinking that it would be just be a cliched story with the synopsis of a cat transforming into a girl and the male mc just considers himself lucky and keeps fucking the girl. Hwober this goes beyond that. Excellently executed and I’d definitely give this doujin a 9/10
